titleStmt.title: Two discourses concerning the affairs of Scotland, written in the year 1698
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Andrew, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Written by Andrew Fletcher. Cf. Wing. Cf. also Publications (Edinburgh Bibliographical Society). Edinburgh, 1896-1935. v. 4, p. 126-128.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
